.. _`motifMatrix`:

MOTIFMATRIX
===========

Build a motif matrix from VRanges object





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_SomaticSignatures_motifMatrix:
        input:
            context = "context.rds"
        output:
            rds = "motifs.rds",
            tsv = "motifs.tsv"
        params:
            extra = "group = 'sampleNames'"
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/bio/SomaticSignatures/motifMatrix"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

Output are optional
